Ocean in a Bottle
Time: 10-30 min Supplies Concepts Guide
Water, Oil, Bottle with lid, Plastic beads, Toothpicks, Hot glue, Thin plastic or tinfoil Density (Physics), Hydrophobic vs. Hydrophilic (Chemistry)

Time: 10-30 min Supplies Concepts Guide

Time: 10-30 min Supplies Concepts Guide

Time: 10 - 20 min Supplies Concepts Guide

Time: 1 hr Supplies Concepts Guide

Ink Chromatography
Time: 30 - 90 min Supplies Concepts Guide
Markers, Paper towels, Water Separation of compounds based on rate of movement (Chromatography), Solubility (Chemistry), Capillary Action (Chemistry)

Time: 10 min to 6 hours Supplies Concepts Guide
Water of different temperatures; Identical-sized clear cups; Food coloring; Flat lid or cardstock. Density(Physics); Thermohaline circulation(Ecology); Lake turnover(Ecology).
